title: Hairline angular typeface
content:
Just began constructing this typeface based on those really fast stars that you draw without your pen lifting off the page. just looking for some feedback on letterforms, which ones look odd or terrible and which ones seem to work better. This started off as a hairline font, but was curious if a 3D version would be worth the effort.  
Thanks.

comments.content: Go for the 3D. That'd be way newer and fresher.
Start with only some glyphs. May be just one word.

I think the 3D shape as a real chance to become a typeface. Take a look at : [http://www.paratype.com/fstore/fonts/Premier.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425021633/http:/www.paratype.com/fstore/fonts/Premier.htm "http://www.paratype.com/fstore/fonts/Premier.htm")
